column4: Also, if someone could tell me how to take Google out of stupid mode when I log into my gmail account I'd be very appreciative.
When I do a google search after logging into gmail is takes away the links to search for my keyword in "images" or "news".  All I get is "start search" or "web search" radio buttons.
I think that's just how it is man. sorry to be the bearer of bad news.
